CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 12, 1955, pg. 2, reads: "Wins Stove - Ollie Mason, city patrolman, of 1045 Brushton Avenue, and his sister, Anna L., admire a new stove which he won recently in a contest from a Homewood store. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Police officer Oliver Mason and his sister Anna L., standing beside electric stove with envelope or document in oven, won from a contest from a Homewood store, in domestic kitchen with two fruit patterned plates on wall, possibly Mason's home at 1045 Brushton Avenue, Homewood
